Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 6/24/1967 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 5th round, 98th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1968...
Injured on 6/18/1968 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Released by New York (A) on 4/15/1969...
Drafted in 5th round, 82nd overall pick, by New York (A) in 1971...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 6/3/1972 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (N) on 7/21/1978 (Going to NYM: RF L. Herndon. Going to CLE: C R. Hodges, SS D. Cripe, P G. Zahn)...
Had first career hit on 6/4/1979, off Paul Edmondson (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/3/1979, off Jim Bibby (PHI)...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 5/5/1981...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1981, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
Injured on 9/24/1982 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 4/12/1983...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1986, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1986, hitting .277 with 7 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 6/29/1988...
Traded from New York (N) to California on 3/2/1989 (Going to NYM: CF A. Diaz. Going to CAL: RF L. Herndon)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1989, hitting .565 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1989...
